entry.title: [CW] I wrote this blogpost explaining part of Curtis Yarvin's "Cathedral" critique in
entry.content:
I wrote this blogpost explaining part of Curtis Yarvin's "Cathedral" critique in more-or-less rationalist terms.
[https://esotericmusings.substack.com/p/absolutist-primer-5](https://esotericmusings.substack.com/p/absolutist-primer-5)
